availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: William P. Sublett (Warren County, Kentucky, farmer and constable )

body.p: Warren County, Kentucky, farmer and constable. Kentucky native. Son of William Sublett and Sarah E. Sublett. Father of John Sublett, Mary Sublett, and Charles Sublett. Married Louretta Smith Sublett in Warren County, Kentucky on October 25, 1852. Laborer in Warren County, Kentucky in 1850. Farmer in Warren County, Kentucky in 1860. Nominated as constable for Warren County, Kentucky in December 1861 at Provisional Government of the State of Kentucky session.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 1, p. 65.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, District 2, p. 637.
Ninth Manuscript Census of the United States (1870), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Warren County, Covington, p. 105.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Warren County Marriages, Film #000339890, p. 185.
KYR-0004-033-0030.
